name: Dragon Scale Armor
description: A set of armor made from the scales of a powerful dragon. It offers superior protection and boosts the wearer's strength.
looks: The dragon scale armor is made of gleaming silver scales that are as strong as steel. The armor covers the wearer from head to toe, providing full-body protection.

special_effects.dragon_scales: Grants the wearer increased resistance to fire damage.

name: Staff of the Ancient Magi
description: A legendary staff wielded by the ancient magi, said to hold immense power.
looks: The staff is made of dark oak wood and is adorned with ancient runes that glow with a mysterious energy. It has a crystal orb at the top that emits a soft, pulsing light.

name: Staff of Healing
description: A magical staff that harnesses the power of healing.
looks: The staff is made of polished wood and is adorned with intricate carvings of leaves and flowers. It emits a soft glow of healing energy.

special_weapon_skills.Healing Mastery: Increases the effectiveness of healing spells and abilities.

special_effects.healing_aura: Emits a healing aura that restores a small amount of HP to nearby allies.

name: Enchanted Sword
description: A magical sword imbued with powerful enchantments.
looks: The sword has a shining silver blade with intricate runes etched into its surface. The hilt is made of polished ebony and adorned with a sparkling gemstone.
